title: I'm Changing: Friendships, Drama, and Oh...the Comma!
description: Starting middle school was supposed to be an exciting time for Tina Morten, but after losing her best friend to her long time enemy, middle school is nothing but a big headache. Switching classes each hour, having different teachers, daydreaming, forgetting to write in her student planner, mood swings, not to mention she starts her period. Things have definitely changed since elementary. Will Tina ever adjust to middle school?
author: Starlet G. Reid
